::DrillBit::

"The only confirmed position is the Engine room."
He re-opened his comm.
"Dark Mouse, you got that info yet?"
He then had a disturbing thought.
"Guys, I think we've done exactly what they want. We were led to believe
they were here. Now we're huddled up here in the Bridge. Their probably
coming to ambush us now, and take the Bridge."

::Hot Rod::

He decided to go see if the lock down was over. He walked out, and
nearly bumped into Feline. He quickly tried to walk away, but there was
no way she could have missed him.

::Demolition::

He continued to sit on the top hatch of the base. What was the base on
lockdown. He couldn't get in, and he didn't like sitting on the hatch
for a day.

::Dollon::

He sat down next to Dark Mouse.
"Couyld you  use an extra pare of hands?"
